title: Goodwin Champions - willing to die trying
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: Goodwin Champions - willing to die trying
posts.post_content:
OK. So it's one of the premier 19th century sets and everyone loves the colors and life-like representations. Big deal. They're just cards. Get over them. I have a some great material I'd be willing to trade in your favor as well as - wait for it - money.

Set 1 - vg-exmt:

anson (vg/vgx)
glasscock
keefe (pending)
dunlap (upgrade)
albert
beecher (vg/vgx)
gaudaur
Kilrain
mitchell
muldoon
myers
prince
slosson
teemer
c wood
zuckertort

Set 2 (lower grade decent front BD ok):

buffalo bill
mckenzie
prince
steinitz
sullivan
zuckertort
Henry--FYI, an Ex Anson in current REA. Don't think Rob will trade but he will take money.
but looking to pay vg/vgx prices for a vg/vgx - with all I collect and all my bills EX probably not in the equation for CASH - which for some unknown reason Rob and the banks seem to expect.....
